title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 60 - Minimum Provisions For Automobile Liability Insurance Policies And Supplementary Uninsured Motorists Insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 60 - Minimum Provisions For Automobile Liability Insurance Policies And Supplementary Uninsured Motorists Insurance

State Regulations

Subpart 60-1 - Minimum Provisions For Automobile Liability Insurance Policies (§ 60-1.1 to 60-1.9)

Subpart 60-2 - Supplementary Uninsured/underinsured Motorists Insurance (§ 60-2.0 to 60-2.4)

Subpart 60-3 - TRANSPORTATION NETWORK COMPANIES: MINIMUM PROVISIONS FOR POLICIES AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS (§ 60-3.0 to 60-3.9)

Subpart 60-4 - Peer-to-Peer Car Sharing Programs: Minimum Provisions for Group Policies and Other Requirements (§ 60-4.0 to 60-4.8)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 60

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, § 311; Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 3420; General Business Law, § 396-z; L. 2002, chs. 584, 656

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subpart 60-1 - Minimum Provisions For Automobile Liability Insurance Policies (§ 60-1.1 to 60-1.9)

Subpart 60-2 - Supplementary Uninsured/underinsured Motorists Insurance (§ 60-2.0 to 60-2.4)

Subpart 60-3 - TRANSPORTATION NETWORK COMPANIES: MINIMUM PROVISIONS FOR POLICIES AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS (§ 60-3.0 to 60-3.9)

Subpart 60-4 - Peer-to-Peer Car Sharing Programs: Minimum Provisions for Group Policies and Other Requirements (§ 60-4.0 to 60-4.8)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 60

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, § 311; Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 3420; General Business Law, § 396-z; L. 2002, chs. 584, 656
